#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <climits>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>
#define MOD 1000000007
#include <map>

using namespace std;

int abs(int a) {
	if (a < 0) {
		return -a;
	}
	return a;
}

int main()
{
	int t, n;
	cin >> t;
	
	while (t--) {
		cin >> n;
		string s, s1[n];
		map<string, int> m1;
		map<string, int> ::iterator it;
		
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			cin >> s;
			s1[i] = s;
			if (m1[s] == 0) {
				m1[s] = 1;
			} else {
				it = m1.find(s);
				m1.erase(it);
			}
		}	
		cout << m1.size() << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
